children.text: The water pipe in this area is exposed and not made from metal, which will be damaged in the event of a bushfire.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3959 Construction of Buildings in Bushfire-Prone Areas, states that
‘Above-ground, exposed water and gas supply pipes shall be metal’ .
This water pipe installation must be rectified to comply with the requirements of AS 3959 Construction of Buildings in Bushfire-Prone Areas.
